response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I would like to offer you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents an excellent value considering its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if this offer meets your budget and aligns with your needs.", "product_price": 12000}
